ZoneType=0;ScriptContent=call_map = _gd_['call_map'] # chan => call_info conf_map = _gd_['conf_map'] # res_id => call_info

last_err = None
conf_info = call_info = None try: conf_info = conf_map[conf_id] except KeyError as e: raise IvrError(0, 'conference id <%s> NOT existed' % conf_id) errno, chan_list, mode_list, timeout_list = GetConferList(conf_id, 0) if errno <= 0: raise IvrError(0, "GetConferList(conf_id={}) returns {}".format(conf_id, errno)) parts = [] for i in range(len(chan_list)): chan = chan_list[i] call_info = call_map[chan] parts.append({ 'res_id': call_info['res_id'], 'chan': chan, 'user_data': call_info['params'].get('user_data'), 'voice_mode': mode_list[i], }) conf_info['parts'] = parts
